name: Schwarzschild
description:
Schwarzschild is a top-down, dungeon-crawling bullet-puzzler where the player methodically turns dungeons against their makers by bending gravity to their will. Follow the self-named cat burglar, Schwarzschild, as he delves deeper into the strangest and most dangerous corners of the city on behalf of a mysterious patron who has granted him superhuman abilities in exchange for a handful of heists. Enter multi-floor dungeons filled with enemies and traps and use Schwarzschild’s superior mobility to out-maneuver adversaries and counter attack with wells of concentrated gravity that disrupt and manipulate the environment around them.

However, with each job it becomes more apparent that perhaps these abilities alone are not enough. Perhaps Schwarzschild was not meant to make it out of this bargain alive.

Schwarzschild is currently in development! This build was created as part of NYU Game Center's 2021 MFA Thesis Showcase.
